trans-unit.source: A timer that is integrated into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> queue which is processed at a specified interval of time and at a specified priority.
trans-unit.target: Um temporizador que é integrado à fila <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> que é processada em um intervalo de tempo especificado e com uma prioridade especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> is reevaluated at the top of every <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> loop.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> será reavaliada na parte superior de cada <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> loop.

trans-unit.source: Timers are not guaranteed to execute exactly when the time interval occurs, but they are guaranteed to not execute before the time interval occurs.
trans-unit.target: Não há garantia de temporizadores para executar exatamente quando ocorre o intervalo de tempo, mas eles têm garantia de não executar antes que ocorra o intervalo de tempo.

trans-unit.source: This is because <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> operations are placed on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> queue like other operations.
trans-unit.target: Isso ocorre porque <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> operações são colocadas no <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> fila como outras operações.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> operation executes is dependent on the other jobs in the queue and their priorities.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> operação executa depende de outros trabalhos na fila e suas prioridades.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=nameWithType> is used in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] application, it is worth noting that the <xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=nameWithType> runs on a different thread then the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=nameWithType> é usado em uma [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] aplicativo, é importante observar que o <xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=nameWithType> é executado em um thread diferente, o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread.

trans-unit.source: In order to access objects on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread, it is necessary to post the operation onto the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread using <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar os objetos no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread, é necessário após a operação para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread usando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Reasons for using a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> opposed to a <xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=nameWithType> are that the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> runs on the same thread as the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> and a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> can be set on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>.
trans-unit.target: Motivos para usar um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> contrário uma <xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=nameWithType> são que o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> é executado no mesmo thread que o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> e um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> podem ser definidas no <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> will keep an object alive whenever the object's methods are bound to the timer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> irá manter um objeto sempre que os métodos do objeto estão associados ao timer.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> that updates the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> que atualiza o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> e chama o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> object named `dispatcherTimer` is created.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> objeto chamado `dispatcherTimer` é criado.

trans-unit.source: The event handler `dispatcherTimer_Tick` is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick> event of `dispatcherTimer`.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos `dispatcherTimer_Tick` é adicionada para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick> eventos de `dispatcherTimer`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Interval%2A> is set to 1 second using a <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> object, and the timer is started.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Interval%2A> é definido como 1 segundo usando um <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> objeto e o temporizador é iniciado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick> event handler updates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that displays the current second, and it calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick> atualizações do manipulador de eventos uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> que exibe a atual em segundo lugar, e chama <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> no <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> runs on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> of the current thread at <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Background> priority.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> é executado no <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> do thread atual em <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Background> prioridade.

trans-unit.source: To specify a different <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, use the following constructor: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar outro <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, use o seguinte construtor: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The priority at which to invoke the timer.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade na qual o temporizador deve ser invocado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer" /> class which processes timer events at the specified priority.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer" /> que processa eventos de temporizador na prioridade especificada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> runs on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> é executado no <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> do thread atual.

trans-unit.source: To specify a different <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, use the following constructor: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher%29>.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar outro <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, use o seguinte construtor: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher%29>.

trans-unit.source: The priority at which to invoke the timer.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade na qual o temporizador deve ser invocado.

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher the timer is associated with.
trans-unit.target: O dispatcher ao qual o temporizador está associado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer" /> class which runs on the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> at the specified priority.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer" /> executada no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> especificado na prioridade especificada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dispatcher" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dispatcher" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The period of time between ticks.
trans-unit.target: O período entre os tiques.

trans-unit.source: The priority at which to invoke the timer.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade na qual o temporizador deve ser invocado.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to call when the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos a ser chamado quando o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick" /> ocorrer.

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher the timer is associated with.
trans-unit.target: O dispatcher ao qual o temporizador está associado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer" /> class which uses the specified time interval, priority, event handler, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer" /> que usa o intervalo de tempo, a prioridade, o manipulador de eventos e o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="callback" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="callback" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="interval" /> is less than 0 or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="interval" /> é menor que 0 ou maior que <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer" />.

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: O dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Dispatcher%2A> property is determined at the creation of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Dispatcher%2A> propriedade é determinada na criação do <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> property is set to the current <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the time of creation unless a different <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is specified.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> está definida como atual <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> no momento da criação, a menos que outro <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> for especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the period of time between timer ticks.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o período entre os tiques do temporizador.

trans-unit.source: The period of time between ticks.
trans-unit.target: O período entre os tiques.

trans-unit.source: The default is 00:00:00.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 00:00:00.

trans-unit.source: Timers are not guaranteed to execute exactly when the time interval occurs, but they are guaranteed to not execute before the time interval occurs.
trans-unit.target: Não há garantia de temporizadores para executar exatamente quando ocorre o intervalo de tempo, mas eles têm garantia de não executar antes que ocorra o intervalo de tempo.

trans-unit.source: This is because <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> operations are placed on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> queue like other operations.
trans-unit.target: Isso ocorre porque <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> operações são colocadas no <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> fila como outras operações.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> operation executes is dependent on the other jobs in the queue and their priorities.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> operação executa depende de outros trabalhos na fila e suas prioridades.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> object named `dispatcherTimer` is created.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> objeto chamado `dispatcherTimer` é criado.

trans-unit.source: The event handler `dispatcherTimer_Tick` is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick> event.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos `dispatcherTimer_Tick` é adicionada para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Interval%2A> is set to 1 second using a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Interval%2A> é definido como 1 segundo usando um <xref:System.TimeSpan> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="interval" /> is less than 0 or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="interval" /> é menor que 0 ou maior ou igual a <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> milissegundos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the timer is running.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o temporizador está em execução.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the timer is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o temporizador estiver habilitado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> must be set to `true` for the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> deve ser definido como `true` para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick> evento ser gerado.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Start%2A> sets <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Chamando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Start%2A> define <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> para `true`.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Stop%2A> sets <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Chamando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Stop%2A> define <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> para `false`.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> object named `dispatcherTimer` is created.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> objeto chamado `dispatcherTimer` é criado.

trans-unit.source: The event handler `dispatcherTimer_Tick` is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick> event.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos `dispatcherTimer_Tick` é adicionada para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Interval%2A> is set to 1 second using a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Interval%2A> é definido como 1 segundo usando um <xref:System.TimeSpan> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Starts the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer" />.

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> to `false` when the timer is started stops the timer.
trans-unit.target: Configuração <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> para `false` quando o temporizador é iniciado interrompe o timer.

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> to `true` when the timer is stopped starts the timer.
trans-unit.target: Configuração <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> para `true` quando o timer é interrompido inicia o temporizador.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Start%2A> sets <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Start%2A> define <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> para `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Start%2A> resets the timer <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Interval%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Start%2A> Redefine o timer de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Interval%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> object named `dispatcherTimer` is created.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> objeto chamado `dispatcherTimer` é criado.

trans-unit.source: The event handler `dispatcherTimer_Tick` is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick> event.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos `dispatcherTimer_Tick` é adicionada para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Interval%2A> is set to 1 second using a <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Interval%2A> é definido como 1 segundo usando um <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Stops the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer" />.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer" />.

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> to `false` when the timer is started stops the timer.
trans-unit.target: Configuração <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> para `false` quando o temporizador é iniciado interrompe o timer.

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> to `true` when the timer is stopped starts the timer.
trans-unit.target: Configuração <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> para `true` quando o timer é interrompido inicia o temporizador.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Stop%2A> sets <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Chamando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Stop%2A> define <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.IsEnabled%2A> para `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a user-defined data object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto de dados definido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados definidos pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the timer interval has elapsed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando termina o intervalo do temporizador.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick> event handler.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer.Tick> manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event handler updates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that displays the current second, and it calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>.
trans-unit.target: As atualizações do manipulador de eventos uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> que exibe a atual em segundo lugar, e chama <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>.
